physical_appearance: The book is bound by white strings that have been threaded through small holes along the edges of the paper. The papers are torn along the top right of the book, and shows wear along the ridges of the paper. Browning has also occurred throughout the book, though particularly evident along the edges of the papers.

title_text: Perfect Man's Model (Quanren Juyue) by Karl Friedrich August Gützlaff
